name: Papper
description:
"Things that go up must come down"  

- Possibly Newton..?

"No, it can't be true,

I could fly if I wanted to.

Like a bird in the sky,

If I believed I could fly,

Well, I'd fly"

- Buzz Lightyear

Delay the inevitable by poking your plane and collect boosters. Upgrade it to reach ever farther.

Made in less than 48h for Ludum Dare 50.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - press and drag to angle plane - release to start flying - click to poke.
